event.title: Datenspuren 2025 - CRA: Cybersicherheit in der Gesellschaft in Dresden, Germany

body.p: Alexander Sander ,FSFE Senior Policy Consultant, together with Michael Schuster will discuss the current state of the Cyber Resilience Act (CRA) implementation and its impact on the Free Software landscape. They will focus on the role of stewards and how to deal with various Free Software stakeholders, based on a questionnaire they have used in their work. The talk will also highlight ways in which the questionnaire results can be incorporated into the CRA's implementation process.
